meanings.definition: The quality of having a non-superimposable mirror image
meanings.sent1: The chiralities of the molecule make it unique.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the chiralities of different compounds.
meanings.sent3: The chiralities of the twins confused the facial recognition software.
meanings.sent4: Her artistic style had the chiralities of a complex puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The chiralities of the snowflakes were mesmerizing to watch.

meanings.definition: The property of a molecule that is not superimposable on its mirror image
meanings.sent1: Understanding the chiralities of molecules is crucial in chemistry.
meanings.sent2: The chiralities of the compound affect its biological activity.
meanings.sent3: The chef joked about the chiralities of the perfectly symmetrical cake.
meanings.sent4: The chiralities of the situation mirrored a classic case of mistaken identity.
meanings.sent5: The chiralities of the crystals under the microscope were fascinating to observe.
